name: OrbitAI
description:
OrbitAI

- Find a new planet for the remnants of humanity.

You are a spaceship navigation AI, responsible for locating a habitable planet.

Travel among the stars and perform complex orbital maneuvers to intercept and analyze planets in the search for a new home for humans.

Headphones or speakers highly recommended.

Ship Controls

W - thrust forward
A, D - change thrust direction
Space - increase timescale (warp)

Hints

You can scoop fuel by intercepting a central star and coasting through its yellow band.

Hold WASD when encountering debris to slowly apply RCS thrust in that direction.

Known Issues

WebGL version does not support low-pass audio filters. Playing the stand-alone version is recommended for the best sound experience, if possible.

Submission to LOWREZJAM 2022

Limitation: 64×64 pixel resolution
Selected themes: "You Are The Last Hope", "Gravity Wells"

Credits

Emma - Code
Esther - Code, music, sound effects

Attribution

Fonts by Daniel Linssen.
